snippet.title: Splitgate 2 Cinematic Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Splitgate 2 coming 2025.
Wishlist now: https://go.splitgate.com/yt-wishlist

Suit up and portal into the action as an elite Ace in Splitgate 2. Dash around the battlefield as the agile Aeros, control the chaos as the time-manipulating Meridian, or devastate your opponents with the raw power of the Sabrask. Take control on Ozone--a flying super yacht --while your friends hold off the other team portalling in from all sides. Find your moment, then claim victory and the spotlight as 100,000 fans cheer you on.

Play together. Stand alone.
https://Splitgate.com

Follow us:
https://twitter.com/Splitgate
https://instagram.com/splitgate
https://www.tiktok.com/@splitgate
https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Splitgate
https://discord.gg/splitgate
